title: Reconnect Issue
body:
After every champion select. I receive this screen:
http://imgur.com/Hii7FQ7


I'm on Windows 10. Recent install
I've disabled the Game DVR stuff
I've reinstalled, twice.

...and now I'm here. I've "scowered" Google, forums, and beyond to no avail. I'm here for desperate help. I've not been able to play a game in about 4 days.

replies.body: If this is happening every time you go into champion select, there's a good chance that something is blocking your network from making a connection to the game lobby you'd be in. We can hit the most frequent solutions with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if that doesn't seem to help.

Same fucking issue I have been having it since 7.6 dropped. I am on windows 8 and disconnect on loading in about 80% of the time. No help whatsoever from staff. The game is making my router shut off both wired and wireless. It's only a matter of time before I get banned for afking for something that I cannot fix on my end whatsoever.
